MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in Bryn-y-ddol and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of delays in resourcing engineers and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:59pm on 23rd of December 2020
